_metadata.description: Vi Tiet's Portfolio Data - Game Developer & Maker

personal.name: Vi Tiet
personal.bio: I'm a passionate developer focused on creating immersive digital experiences through 2D/3D visualization, AR/VR applications, and game development. With expertise in Unity, C++, and Swift, I bring cutting-edge technologies to life while building efficient tools and workflows.

journey.title: Nursing Days
journey.description: Caring for patients while secretly dreaming of pixels and code

journey.title: First Line of Code
journey.description: Hello World! The moment that changed everything

journey.title: Game Dev Launch
journey.description: From Unity to Unreal, building worlds one script at a time

back.content: Spent years caring for patients, then discovered the magic of creating programs. Sometimes the best debugging skills come from patiently listening to error messages like patient complaints!
Building immersive worlds where players can escape reality. From Unity to Unreal, every project teaches me something new about storytelling through code.
3D printing, custom keyboards, woodworking ‚Äì when I'm not coding, I'm building something physical. The tactile satisfaction of creating never gets old.

education.description: Comprehensive nursing education with focus on patient care and healthcare systems
Intensive self-directed learning in game development, programming, and software engineering

skills.name: Unity & C#
skills.description: Developed a wide range of games and applications with Unity and C# for Windows & Mac.

skills.name: C++
skills.description: Built applications using C++, focusing on OOP and efficient code practices.

skills.name: Swift
skills.description: Created an AR app for Apple Vision Pro utilizing Swift, enhancing user interaction with innovative software & hardware integration.

skills.name: Max 8 Pipelines
skills.description: Engineered highly complex audio signal processing pipelines for custom hardware using Max 8, while ensuring precision and efficiency.

skills.name: Moonshot Videos
skills.description: Edited moonshot demo videos with custom software and hardware, delivering high-impact visual presentations.

skills.name: Clipchamp/CapCut
skills.description: Experienced in video editing with Clipchamp and Capcut, producing high quality content.

skills.name: Custom Keyboards
skills.description: Thock is my jock! Building the perfect creamy sound

skills.name: Woodworking
skills.description: From code to carpentry, creating with my hands

funFacts: I once solved a coding problem I've stuck on for days in my dream
My first 3D printer is a Bambu Lab X1C
I can type 110 WPM on my custom mechanical keyboard
Built my first game while learning game dev during the pandemic

showAndTell.caption: Thock is my jock!
showAndTell.description: Hand-wired mechanical keyboard with custom keycaps

showAndTell.title: 3D Printed Design
showAndTell.caption: From pixels to plastic
showAndTell.description: Custom phone stand with integrated cable management

showAndTell.title: Woodworking Project
showAndTell.caption: Sawdust therapy
showAndTell.description: Handcrafted desk organizer with hidden compartments

hq.title: Headquarters
hq.description: My digital headquarters where I craft games and code adventures. Currently stationed in the Mississauga area.
